name: Logger++
author: kafeijao
description:
Simple `Plugin` that redirects **and** filters unity logs to the Melon Loader console.

__**Features**__
- Enable/Disable filters (melon prefs).
- Rate Limit the same log to only be printed every 5 secs max.
- Enable full stack traces for `info`/`warning`/`error` Logs.

**Note:** The IL offsets are not printed in the MelonLogger console because unity adds those internally :(

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/Logger++) for more in-depth info.
changelog:
- Fixed for 2025r178
- Added button to globally disable on MelonPrefs
- Moved the logging into main thread to avoid some crashes
